revised_title: Neurotrophins and Sensory Neurons: Role in Development, Maintenance, and Injury
tldr: The article discusses the role of neurotrophins, such as nerve growth factor (NGF) and neurotrophin-3 (NT-3), in the development, maintenance, and injury of sensory neurons. It highlights how NGF and NT-3 can counteract the changes that occur in sensory neurons after injury, such as alterations in morphology, enzyme expression, and peptide levels. The study focuses on understanding the actions of neurotrophins in nerve injury and repair and the intracellular pathways involved.
